p: In general, asymptomatic infected people do not suffer seriously, but the virus they transmit can cause others to develop severe disease [ 15]. Those with asymptomatic infections did not always show lung changes such as ground glass opacities after CT examination, and may appear normal [ 28]. Yet, in other cases the typical changes in CT examination may be observed [ 27]. Changes in laboratory test indicators typical of SARS-CoV-2 infection have been found in some asymptomatic patients [ 11, 22, 27], but for others, indicators are normal ( Table 1) [ 14, 19, 26].
